TopicTitle: [1.2.x] [1.4 in Development] Real KSC in KSP Dev Continued

Articles.Content: Good luck Tristonwilson!!
I'm home... Still hurt tho
What happened?

Guys, could we keep this on topic please?

I know the thing with your ear triston, it's really ...., but at least it seems you're fine now. ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
Yep I agree

> 
> Guys, could we keep this on topic please?
> I know the thing with your ear triston, it's really ...., but at least it seems you're fine now. ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Yea sorry... Just thought I'd update everyone
Yes, I didn't mean to be rude.

> 
> Yes, I didn't mean to be rude.

It's fine.. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Its all good. Btw anone working on Jiuquan? It would go great with my taiyang shen rocket
Don't think so... I've got my hands full already.

> 
> Its all good. Btw anone working on Jiuquan? It would go great with my taiyang shen rocket

I'm not on the project, but ill work on it.

Triston did you get my skype request?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-09-08T01:42:56Z" title="09/08/2015 01:42  AM" data-short="8 yr">September 8, 2015</time> by MajorLeaugeRocketScience**

> 
> Triston did you get my skype request?

yep I did

- - - Updated - - -

change of plans streaming now... til like 9
Getting blender and unity... HYPE. In other words, I'm ready to start modelling
Nice!!
will there be the current slc's at the KSC?
Yes I think so

> 
> will there be the current slc's at the KSC?

Yes there are

SLC-41 (kartoffulkuchen)![hhW4YdF.png](http://i.imgur.com/hhW4YdF.png)

My SpaceX complex is pretty much done as far as modeling goes. Texturing shouldn't take too long, but at the moment I am otherwise pre-occupied.

![aoOvkYp.png](http://i.imgur.com/aoOvkYp.png)
when should we expect an alpha release?![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)

> 
> when should we expect an alpha release?![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)

Difficult to say. Everyone involved in this mod is pretty busy with their own mods and/or helping out others at the same time.
thats okay i was just wondering [i've been making a make-shift missle row with Kerbal Konstructs recently}

If i can hand my projects over now, I would appreciate that. Running the Taiyang Shen mod and school is taking most of my time right now. I might start another launch site soon, but I think I'll hand them over for now. Pm me if your intrested
Hey triston, if you are alright with it, i'd like to put the shuttle gantry in the ssp until real ksc has a download link (at which point we will remove it from the pack)
Good luck expedition 44!!
